CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​CodeDB.​Manager
CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​Module
public
CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​CodeDB.​Manager
Functions
CreateDatabase
protected void CreateDatabase ()

Assumes the database is completely empty, not just of data but of table definitions too, and initializes it.  Also initializes the system variables so you don't have to call LoadSystemVariables() afterwards.

GetVersion
protected Version GetVersion ()

Retrieves the database version.

LoadSystemVariables
protected void LoadSystemVariables ()

Retrieves various system variables from the database.  This currently includes:

  • UsedTopicIDs

  • UsedLinkIDs

  • UsedImageLinkIDs

  • UsedClassIDs

  • UsedContextIDs

SaveSystemVariablesAndVersion
protected void SaveSystemVariablesAndVersion ()

Saves various system variables to the database, as well as setting the version variable to the current version.
